body.name: CCCEI Garage Tools Storage with Charging Station. Power Tool Battery Organizer Utility Shelf with Power Strip. 4 Drills Holder Wall Mount Rack, Black.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 9 hrs 52 mins
features: Power tools and batteries organizer with charging station, and have a single place to live. It doesn't take long to find them, will improve efficiency and come with integrated 8 outlets power strip. Made entirely of metal, strong and durable.

8 plugs on the top of the tools storage shelf, and power tools and batteries can be charged there, your battery is fully charged before the next job, and can charge multiple devices at once in the same place where the tools are organized.

Very convenient for charging your tool batteries, All-in-one design and the metal power strip with surge protection of 1200J, Able to protect your device to a certain extent, output: 125V/15A/1875W. Utility rack size: L:30.9in * W:16.9in * H:9.37in.

It will be pretty useful improvement for your garage and includes double shelves, 4 drill holder, power strip, 16 storage holes designed for different size tools. Offers black, red, and yellow as options to match your own tools.

It can quickly assembled in 10-15 minutes, please follow the instructions, come with all the tools needed to put it together, please test the power supply before assembly. Wall mount design, very easy to mount on the wall.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Convenient for charging tool batteries Lightweight Power Tool Organizer with Power Strip The convenience of having power plug within reach when you need one! 4 drills holder and tools organizer holes.Power tool organizer wall-mounted, double shelves.8 AC outlets charging station and surge protected.
Wall Mount, Garage Organization and Offer Power

Brand Overview Welcome to CCCEI Brand, we provide professional office desktop socket and industrial socket equipment, more item is built for business and furniture use, and now we also have some practical garage tools organizers. We are very happy to serve our customers and offer more favorable discount for more cooperation. CCCEI brand lightweight power tool organizer with charging station, provide power solutions for garage power tools. Built-in 8 outlets metal heavy duty power strip, 15 Amp not only charge your batteries, but also supply power to power tools. Save the cost of purchasing additional power strip.Metal 8 outlets wide spaced power strip - Output: 125V/15A/1875W. Surge Protector: 1200J. Power Cord: 6FT 14AWG. Aluminum Alloy Housing.Wall mount power tools organizer come with 4 slots drills holder, 16 tools organizer holes, 2 shelves. Save your bench space.Rack Size: L:30.9inch * W:16.9inch * H:9.37inch. 2-layer rack structure: the maximum bearing capacity of each layer is 33IB. Click "CCCEI" above to our brand store to get more style options:
Save Space and Keep Your Desk Tidy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenience of pugging in just one outlet to power my charging stands
reviews.reviewText: This fit nicely on top of a tool cabinet and allowed me to plug all my charging stands into the station. Now I can turn on/off the whole station to get multiple charging stands to charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: all my photo batteries are perfectly organized, it's super practical

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars All of my Power Tool Chargers in one place!
reviews.reviewText: If you're busy like me then your garage is most likely not as clean and organized as you would like it to be, this at least helps keep my power tool chargers and drills all in one convenient place. The shelf itself is easy to assemble and sturdy. The built in power strip makes it easy to plug in all the chargers and keeps it looking nice and neat. The hangers holds all my different brand drills nicely, with or without a battery. It's a nice shelf.

reviews.reviewText: Grat for power tool organization. A must buy. Great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I'm definitely impressed with this little shelf, I weigh too many tools and nowhere to put them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hey, it got Hubs to organize his work space. He loves it.
reviews.reviewText: Best gift I ever got for my husband. His messy workbench was driving me nuts, not to mention, slowing down his progress on the Honey Do list. This CCCEI Garage Tools Storage with Charging Station is the perfect solution to keep his workspace organized and his power tools fully charged. Designed for the battery powered tool user, the DIYers and carpenters, builders, etc. It is a utility shelf must-have addition to any garage or workshop.It has a nice black finish and wall mount design so it saves precious workbench space, convenient for battery charging. The built-in power strip with multiple outlets ensures that all your power tools are ready to go whenever you need them. Cords aren’t all tangled and you’ve got the outlets right there. It looks sharp and professional hanging in his workshop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has made a huge difference in my garage
reviews.reviewText: This rack organizes all of my power tools and makes it easier to have all of my rechargeable batteries charged and or charging at the same time. Before this I was always switching out batteries and chargers with the two outlets near my tool bench, which worked, but I would always forget to go back after one was charged and plug in another one. Now I have this rack up, all the power tools hang from the sides and all the charging stations sit on the shelves and are each plugged into the power strip that comes with the rack, just needs to be assembled when you get it. This rack has made the biggest difference of all my garage organization efforts, love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Game Changer For My Workbench Mess
reviews.reviewText: I got this to help clean up my workbench/garage chaos and it did just that. I have multiple drills, chargers, bits, etc, you name it and they were all in different spots. I love that you can wall mount this, which frees up bench or shelving space right off the batt. The 8 outlet power strip means you can have everything in one spot, near one outlet without wire spaghetti all over the place. I placed everything where I wanted it and used zip ties to consolidate the wire mess.The unit itself was easy to put together. Couldn't have taken more than 20 min. Simple picture instructions were included. If you tighten the first few screws really well, you will likely have to loosen them to fit the shelf when it comes time. It's a tight fit, but that's not a bad thing.For drills and chargers, the strength/durability is adequate. I don't think it would hold up to any real weight, but that's not what it's meant for. The metal looks like it is powder coated, I don't think it will scratch easily. Hopefully, I will get some milage out of this.My only complaint is the dinky mounting hardware included, but that's true of most shelves, etc these days. Do yourself a favor and mount over a stud or have better mounting hardware available. The little allen key and baby wrench are also funny, but I guess if you don't have the grown up size on hand, they're a good addition.The 2 side racks for screw drivers and the like are also a little silly in my opinion. They kind of clutter things up. Tools would have to be on the shorter side to make it work. If you only have a couple screw drivers or pliers it's probably fine, but for anyone with any real variety, just skip in and use a tool box or drawer.The shelves are nice to have. Again, not for any real weight, but if you want to keep a bit case or two there, it's a nice feature.For the average homeowner, this is definitely adequate.
